mapper.select: /* sales */ SELECT SALES_CD, PARENTSALES_CD, AP2_CD, AP1_CD, LEVEL AS LEVEL_CD , SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(SALES_CD, '_') || '_' AS PATH FROM TB_MST_SALES START WITH PARENTSALES_CD IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR SALES_CD = PARENTSALES_CD

/* product */ SELECT ITEM_CD, PRODUCTGROUP_CD, PRODUCT_CD, PARENT_CD, LEVEL AS LEVEL_CD , SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(ITEM_CD, '_') || '_' AS PATH FROM TB_MST_PRODUCT START WITH PARENT_CD IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR ITEM_CD = PARENT_CD
